dialogue.speaker: Lila
dialogue.text: Welcome to our humble village! I'm Lila, the village elder.

dialogue.speaker: Eryndor Thorne
dialogue.text: Greetings, Lila. My name is Eryndor Thorne, a weary traveler seeking refuge and supplies.

dialogue.speaker: Lila
dialogue.text: A brave adventurer, I see. We've had... troubles in the nearby forest. Dark creatures lurk within.
